title: Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore: Be A Junior Ranger
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Be A Junior Ranger              Be A Junior Ranger         Nationa Park Service Junior Ranger Symbol NPS  Junior Ranger Activity Book  Calling all kids!  Would you like to have even more fun during your visit to Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore? If so, download or pick up a free Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore Junior Ranger booklet at any park visitor center.  Play park bingo, identify wildlife tracks, find out what the different colored rocks are in our cliffs, and learn about shipwrecks and logging. Complete different activities and earn your official Junior Ranger badge and certificate.    So join in the fun! Become a National Park Junior Ranger! We need your help taking care of our national treasures. You'll enjoy learning about and taking pride in America's National Parks.  Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore Junior Ranger Booklet (pdf) - New in 2016.              Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore Jr Ranger Book NPS       Additional Junior Ranger Activities  NPS Web Rangers www.nps.gov/webrangers  NPS Junior Ranger Programs  www.nps.gov/kids/jrRangers.cfm  NPS Great Lakes Inventory and Monitoring Network Great Lakes Junior Ranger Activity Booklet (pdf) NPS Natural Sounds and Night Skies Division Junior Ranger Night Explorer (pdf)  USDA-Forest Service, Bureau of Land Management, U.S. Fish and WIldlife Service, National Park Service Wilderness Explorer Junior Ranger Activities (pdf) educators.wilderness.net       Return to top of page
